mapper.insert: insert into caecandidatecheckresult (candidateCheckResultId, recepitNumber, `name`, errorReason) values (#{candidatecheckresultid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recepitnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select candidateCheckResultId, recepitNumber, `name`, errorReason from caecandidatecheckresult
